snippets.heading: EOSEVM Open Sourced - 27 Apr 2023
snippets.content: The #EOS EVM source code has officially been open sourced! 📣  This is an important milestone for the EVM, keeping with the #ENF's core values of open collaboration and transparency 🔍  EOS EVM GitHub: https://github.com/eosnetworkfoundation/eos-evm (https://github.com/eosnetworkfoundation/eos-evm/)

snippets.heading: EOSEVM - 'no bugs'
snippets.content: 'We've audited so many EVMs in our time & this the first EVM we've ever audited where we've found no bugs' 🗣 Charles Holtzkampf of Sentnl.io - ' The #EOS EVM is so robust that even the number one bug bounty hunter on Ethereum couldn't find any vulnerabilities' 💪

snippets.heading: Crypto_Apologist - 05 May 2023
snippets.content: 'EOS Breaking the Limits of Blockchain Antelope Networks Elastic Sidechains Explained - Blockchain technology is pretty cool, but one major problem has been holding it back: scalability. Antelope Networks has the solution: elastic sidechains! ... '  - You Tube - 6m- : https://youtu.be/fTZ4F2qNBVU

snippets.heading: Hot_Sauce - 05 May 2023
snippets.content: Fridays 16:00 UTC : '🌶Hot Sauce 198🌶 - '✅EOS EVM is Open Sourced ✅Consensus 2023 Recap ✅Bart Wyatt is Featured on Architects of Consensus ✅EOS EVM Webinar by Zaisan ✅Wombat X Accelerator ✅ZEOS Updates & Developments ✅Cointelegraph Magazine Feature: EOS' Grassroots Comeback ✅ENF Quarterly Report📊' - You Tube -21m- : 📺 https://www.youtube.com/live/2Lt_b1it5D8?feature=share&t=493 📺'
